name: Dicy Hero
description:
Controls

Move:  WASD or Arrow Keys.
Shoot: Left mouse click.
Aim: Mouse movement.

Play as a dice with multiple personalities and weapons. Every time you move your powers change.

Try to survive as much as possible in this hostile world against dices.

Credits ------------------
